topic.title: [solved] Will renamed / moved files be re-downloaded
[question] If enough peers refuse to share certain user files, will they dissapear forever?
topic.body:
Or another question would be, how does my client know I'm missing 
`data/users/1ADB7TdX2fVbTsWBoMe9yBTmVXTbb33b4R/data.json` for example
I mean its not registered anywhere (like in the site's `content.json`) but only with the peers that have this file.

14_15ATNsS6aHGvBg5xoMP94sXpNaLX4fSHjN.body:
> [bot](#comment_47_1KdnTJVBGzEZrJppFZtzfG9chukuMv8xSb):
How can you sign user files?

1_1DWrKbEomgBLHjczm1HkP556Vg68ewDmyd.body: Pretty interesting, but not practical I think.

16_15ATNsS6aHGvBg5xoMP94sXpNaLX4fSHjN.body:
> [up4](#comment_59_1BLPKyrF2D4ertte6JnAa6oWAMYzZGwKQz): 
My HDD didn't have any space left so when I added a new topic, my `data.json` was removed somehow, I deleted the site and re-downloaded my file, and re-added whatever I could.

> [up4](#comment_60_1BLPKyrF2D4ertte6JnAa6oWAMYzZGwKQz):
You could add my content as comments to yours, if you got the topic contents I'll add that myself.

> [up4](#):
How did the talk go by the way

1_1PfkkZqaisKpxheXwbqKwoMZBbCeddKfLm.body:
You click on a movie you like to watch and then you can download a movie by magnet link with your BitTorrent client

Edit: The number of movies listed there is a bit more than ~190, more like ~4900

4_1PSaHi14Xh4Kjo3yyjDgbRtj4YLQgWV4QJ.body:
> [ulrichard](#comment_9_1PSaHi14Xh4Kjo3yyjDgbRtj4YLQgWV4QJ): I'm looking for a way that visitors can contact me with a web form. I don't want to bother regular internet users with zeronet id's.
Take a look at how http://127.0.0.1:43110/Board.ZeroNetwork.bit/ works. It doesn't require users to be logged in. 
Maybe you can start with cloning it and add some CSS to suit your need.

ZeroBoard doesn't have any encryption so... you might consider using [kbpgp - Keybase's PGP for JavaScript](https://github.com/keybase/kbpgp)
